results.definition: an operation that segregates items into groups according to a specified criterion
examples: the bottleneck in mail delivery is the process of sorting

results.definition: arrange or order by classes or categories
examine in order to test suitability
a category of things distinguished by some common characteristic or quality

examples: she wore a sort of magenta dress
she served a creamy sort of dessert thing

results.definition: a person of a particular character or nature
examples: what sort of person is he?
